title: Hike
body: The Corcovado National Park is one of the most biodiverse places in the world. It is home to a lot of wildlife and nature. The best way to explore it is by hiking.

title: Fishing
body: Puerto Jiménez is a great place to go fishing. There are a lot of fish in the area, and you can go fishing in the ocean or in the rivers.

title: Kayaking
body: Puerto Jiménez is a great place to go kayaking. There are a lot of rivers and lakes in the area, and you can go kayaking in them.

title: Snorkeling
body: Puerto Jiménez is a great place to go snorkeling. There are a lot of fish and other sea creatures in the area, and you can snorkel in the ocean.
